languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс делает еще один шаг назад и бросает на вас последний взгляд, прежде чем отвернуться.{/n} "Тебе следует вернуться к гостям. Отсутствие Вольного Торговца обязательно заметят". {n}Он молчит несколько секунд.{/n} "До встречи".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс делает еще один шаг назад и бросает на вас последний взгляд, прежде чем отвернуться.{/n} "Тебе следует вернуться к гостям. Отсутствие Вольного Торговца обязательно заметят". {n}Он молчит несколько секунд.{/n} "До встречи".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix takes another step backward and casts one last look at you before turning away.{/n} "You should return to your guests. The absence of the Rogue Trader will definitely be noted." {n}He says nothing for a few seconds.{/n} "Until next time."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс делает еще один шаг назад и бросает на вас последний взгляд, прежде чем отвернуться.{/n} "Тебе следует вернуться к гостям. Отсутствие Вольного Торговца обязательно заметят". {n}Он молчит несколько секунд.{/n} "До встречи".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix takes another step backward and casts one last look at you before turning away.{/n} "You should return to your guests. The absence of the Rogue Trader will definitely be noted." {n}He says nothing for a few seconds.{/n} "Until next time."

{n}Heinrix takes another step backward and casts one last look at you before turning away.{/n} "You should return to your guests. The absence of the Rogue Trader will definitely be noted." {n}He says nothing for a few seconds.{/n} "Until next time."

{n}Heinrix takes another step backward and casts one last look at you before turning away.{/n} "You should return to your guests. The absence of the Rogue Trader will definitely be noted." {n}He says nothing for a few seconds.{/n} "Until next time."

{n}Heinrix takes another step backward and casts one last look at you before turning away.{/n} "You should return to your guests. The absence of the Rogue Trader will definitely be noted." {n}He says nothing for a few seconds.{/n} "Until next time."

languages.text: {n}海因里希又向后退了一步，最后看了你一眼，随后转过了身。{/n}“你得回到客人们身边了。若是行商浪人缺席，势必会引起别人注意。”{n}他沉默了几秒钟。{/n}“下次见吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes another step backward and casts one last look at you before turning away.{/n} "You should return to your guests. The absence of the Rogue Trader will definitely be noted." {n}He says nothing for a few seconds.{/n} "Until next time."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希又向后退了一步，最后看了你一眼，随后转过了身。{/n}“你得回到客人们身边了。若是行商浪人缺席，势必会引起别人注意。”{n}他沉默了几秒钟。{/n}“下次见吧。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix da otro paso atrás y te mira por última vez antes de girarse.{/n} «Debería volver con sus invitados. La ausencia de la Comerciante Independiente no pasará desapercibida». {n}Unos segundos después, añade:{/n} «Hasta la próxima».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes another step backward and casts one last look at you before turning away.{/n} "You should return to your guests. The absence of the Rogue Trader will definitely be noted." {n}He says nothing for a few seconds.{/n} "Until next time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix da otro paso atrás y te mira por última vez antes de girarse.{/n} «Debería volver con sus invitados. La ausencia de la Comerciante Independiente no pasará desapercibida». {n}Unos segundos después, añade:{/n} «Hasta la próxima».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはもう一歩後ずさりし、背を向ける前にあなたを最後に見た。{/n}「客のところに戻るべきだ。自由開拓者の不在は、きっと目を引いてしまう」{n}彼は数秒間、何も言わなかった。{/n}「また会おう」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes another step backward and casts one last look at you before turning away.{/n} "You should return to your guests. The absence of the Rogue Trader will definitely be noted." {n}He says nothing for a few seconds.{/n} "Until next time."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはもう一歩後ずさりし、背を向ける前にあなたを最後に見た。{/n}「客のところに戻るべきだ。自由開拓者の不在は、きっと目を引いてしまう」{n}彼は数秒間、何も言わなかった。{/n}「また会おう」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix fait un autre pas en arrière et vous regarde une dernière fois avant de se détourner.{/n} « Vous devriez retourner auprès de vos invités avant qu'ils ne remarquent votre absence. » {n}Il se tait pendant quelques secondes.{/n} « À bientôt. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes another step backward and casts one last look at you before turning away.{/n} "You should return to your guests. The absence of the Rogue Trader will definitely be noted." {n}He says nothing for a few seconds.{/n} "Until next time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix fait un autre pas en arrière et vous regarde une dernière fois avant de se détourner.{/n} « Vous devriez retourner auprès de vos invités avant qu'ils ne remarquent votre absence. » {n}Il se tait pendant quelques secondes.{/n} « À bientôt. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix macht einen weiteren Schritt zurück und sieht dich ein letztes Mal an, bevor er sich abwendet.{/n} "Ihr solltet zu Euren Gästen zurück. Es wird definitiv auffallen, wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} abwesend ist." {n}Er sagt einige Sekunden lang nichts.{/n} "Bis zum nächsten Mal."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes another step backward and casts one last look at you before turning away.{/n} "You should return to your guests. The absence of the Rogue Trader will definitely be noted." {n}He says nothing for a few seconds.{/n} "Until next time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix macht einen weiteren Schritt zurück und sieht dich ein letztes Mal an, bevor er sich abwendet.{/n} "Ihr solltet zu Euren Gästen zurück. Es wird definitiv auffallen, wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} abwesend ist." {n}Er sagt einige Sekunden lang nichts.{/n} "Bis zum nächsten Mal."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, geriye doğru bir adım daha atıyor. Sana son bir bakış atıp arkasını dönüyor.{/n} "Konuklarının yanına dönmelisin. Hür Tacir'in yokluğu, muhakkak ki dikkat çekecektir." {n}Birkaç saniye boyunca hiçbir şey söylemiyor.{/n} "Görüşmek üzere."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes another step backward and casts one last look at you before turning away.{/n} "You should return to your guests. The absence of the Rogue Trader will definitely be noted." {n}He says nothing for a few seconds.{/n} "Until next time."
